title: 독일산 도전과제
content:
[[module CSS]]

/* Grid layout */

#page-content .left-grid {
    float: left;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}
#page-content .right-grid {
    float: right;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}

/* Mobile Media Query */
@media (max-width: 479px) { 
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Note Media Query */
@media (min-width: 480px) and (max-width: 580px) { 
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Tablet Media Query */
@media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 979px) {
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

[[/module]]

[[include credit:start]]
**원작:** http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/achievements
**저자:** [[*user Dr Ore]]
**역자:** [[*user salamander724]]
@@@@
Bilderdaten siehe in der [http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/forum/t-3172248/achievements Diskussion]

[[include credit:end]]

[[toc]]

+ 창작 관련 
++ 실적별
[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Nachwuchsforscher.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de1)^^ 주임연구원**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**SCP-KO 창작 5건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Forscher.png height="70px" ]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/O5-Aufseher.png height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de4)^^ O5 평의원**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**SCP-KO 창작 50건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----
[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Sicher_5.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de5)^^ 안전한 것부터 시작**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**안전 SCP-KO 창작 5건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]

[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de6)^^ 안전제일**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**안전 SCP-KO 창작 10건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Sicher_20.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de7)^^ 소중한 안전!**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**안전 SCP-KO 창작 20건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Euclid_5.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de8)^^ 이건 좀 위험할 수도**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**유클리드 SCP-KO 창작 5건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Euclid_10.png height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de9)^^ 중간 가는 미덕**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**유클리드 SCP-KO 창작 10건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Euclid_20.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de10)^^ 유클리드 백작**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**유클리드 SCP-KO 창작 20건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Keter_5.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de11)^^ 아이고 이런**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**케테르 SCP-KO 창작 5건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Keter_10.png height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de12)^^ 관 쓴 자**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**케테르 SCP-KO 창작 10건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Keter_20.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de13)^^ 케테르 국왕**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**케테르 SCP-KO 창작 20건 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Thaumiel.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de14)^^ 최고의 등급**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**타우미엘 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Neutralisiert.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de15)^^ 망자를 기억하며**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**무효화 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Unhaltbar.png  height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de16)^^ 버틸 수가 없다**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**아폴리온 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Never_change_a_running_system.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de17)^^ 잘 되는 거 괜히 바꾸지 마라**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**히에말 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/EX.png height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de18)^^ 이쪽은 내 전...**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**해명 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/[UNBEKANNT].png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de19)^^ [정체불명]**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**앞서 규정된 것들에 해당하지 않는 등급의 SCP-KO 창작 성공 (농담은 제외)**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Pausenclown.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de20)^^ 익살꾼**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**농담 SCP-KO 1개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Hofnarr.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de21)^^ 어릿광대**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**농담 SCP-KO 3개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Kom%C3%B6diant.png   height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de22)^^ 코미디언**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**농담 SCP-KO 10개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Flush.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de23)^^ 플러시**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**안전・유클리드・케테르 SCP-KO 각 1개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Straight_Flush.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de24)^^ 스트레이트 플러시**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**안전・유클리드・케테르・농담 SCP-KO, 그리고 이야기 각 1개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Royal_Straight_Flush.png   height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de25)^^ 로열 스트레이트 플러시**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**안전・유클리드・케테르・농담・타우미엘 SCP-KO, 그리고 이야기 각 1개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----

++ 주제별 

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Vor_unserer_Ära.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de26)^^ 우리 이전의 시대**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**현생인류 출현 이전에 생겨난 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Aufstieg_der_Menschheit.png height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de27)^^ 인류의 흥기**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**인류 발생에서 6세기 사이에 생겨난 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Im_finsteren_Mittelater.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de28)^^ 암흑의 중세**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**6세기-15세기에 생겨난 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/WW1.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de29)^^ 모든 전쟁을 끝내기 위한 전쟁**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**1차대전기에 생겨난 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/WW2.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de30)^^ 지상 최대의 전쟁**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**2차대전기에 생겨난 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Eiserner_Vorhang.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de31)^^ 철의 장막**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**냉전기에 생겨난 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Everett.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de32)^^ 에버렛 만이 옳았다**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**평행우주에서 온 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Märchen-Onkel.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de33)^^ 동화구연사**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**신화・전설・민담을 소재로 한 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Der_Bildschirm_wird_dich_nicht_beschützen.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de34)^^ 모니터를 뚫고**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**메타 속성의 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Ist_das_normal.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de35)^^ 이래도 되나?**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**어떤 식으로든 표준 보고서 양식을 깨는 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Zeit.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de36)^^ 길? 우리가 지금 가는 데는 길이 필요 없어**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**시간에 영향을 끼치거나 시간여행을 할 수 있는 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Unendliche_Weiten.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de37)^^ 무한한 공간**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**우주에 있는 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Was_haben_wir_getan.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de38)^^ 우리가 무슨 짓을?**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**재단이-만듦 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Apocalypse_How.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de39)^^ 지옥의 혹시록**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**K급 시나리오가 가능한 SCP-KO 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/001.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de40)^^ 저승탈출 넘버원**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**SCP-001-KO 제안 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

~~~~
----

++ 요주의 단체

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/XXV.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de41)^^ 보위부 간첩**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**제25분견국 관련 항목 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]

[[size 85%]]**제25분견국 관련 항목 5개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/4R.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de43)^^ 악마학자**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**제4독일국 관련 항목 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Das_neue_tausendjährige_Reich.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de44)^^ 새천년나치당**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**제4독일국 관련 항목 5개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/R.T.I..png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de45)^^ 인공지능**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**랍토르테크 관련 항목 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Schwarzmarkthändler.png  height="70px" ]]

[[size 85%]]**랍토르테크 관련 항목 5개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Magierakademie.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de47)^^ 마술 스승**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**마술사한림원 관련 항목 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Magieforscher.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de48)^^ 마술의 구도자**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**마술사한림원 관련 항목 5개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/CC.png height="70px"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de49)^^ 나뭇가지 아래서**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**눈먼 홍옥수 관련 항목 창작 성공**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki-de.wdfiles.com/local--files/achievements/Für_die_Krone.png  height="70px" ]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**^^de50)^^ 관을 위하여**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**눈먼 홍옥수 관련 항목 5개 창작 성공**[[/size]]
